text: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ هَآؤُمُ ٱقْرَءُوا۟ كِتَـٰبِيَهْ

translation.en.sahih: So as for he who is given his record in his right hand, he will say, "Here, read my record!
translation.id.indonesian: Adapun orang-orang yang diberikan kepadanya kitabnya dari sebelah kanannya, maka dia berkata: "Ambillah, bacalah kitabku (ini)".
